bit_field.name: Default Boot Source
bit_field.description: Default Boot Source

bit_field_value.name: BOOT_CFG_DEFAULT_BOOT_SOURCE_VALUE_4
bit_field_value.description: Auto boot similar to ISP auto boot option.

bit_field.name: Default ISP mode
bit_field.description: Default ISP mode

bit_field.name: Boot Speed
bit_field.description: Boot Speed

bit_field.name: ITRC_ZEROIZE
bit_field.description: RAM zeroize on ITRC event.

bit_field.name: ASRT_FATAL
bit_field.description: Assert on fatal errors. When set ROM drives BOOT_FAIL_PIN high when fatal error condition occurs on three attempts to boot image before locking the part.

bit_field.name: ASRT_RBF
bit_field.description: Assert on receovery boot. When this bit is set ROM drives the BOOT_FAIL_PIN high whenever no valid image is found in primary boot media and execution enters recovery boot mode from secondary boot media.

bit_field.name: ASRT_ISPF
bit_field.description: Assert on ISP fall through. When this bit is set ROM drives BOOT_FAIL_PIN high whenever there is no valid image in boot mediaand execution falls through to ISP mode.

bit_field.name: Boot Failure Pin
bit_field.description: GPIO port and pin number to use for indicating failure reason. The toggle rate of the pin is used to decode the error type.

bit_field.name: SPI_RECOVERY_BOOT_EN
bit_field.description: SPI flash recovery boot is enabled, if non-zero value is written to this field.

bit_field.name: SPI_REC_IF
bit_field.description: Recovery SPI interface

bit_field.name: CAN_BAUD_RATE
bit_field.description: CAN Baud Rate

bit_field.name: NIDEN
bit_field.description: Non Secure non-invasive debug enable

bit_field.name: DBGEN
bit_field.description: Non Secure debug enable

bit_field.name: SPNIDEN
bit_field.description: Secure non-invasive debug enable

bit_field.name: SPIDEN
bit_field.description: Secure invasive debug enable

bit_field.name: DSP_DBGEN
bit_field.description: DSP debug enable

bit_field.name: ISP_CMD_EN
bit_field.description: ISP boot command enable

bit_field.name: FA_CMD_EN
bit_field.description: FA cmd enable

bit_field.name: ME_CMD_EN
bit_field.description: Flash Mass Erase cmd enable

bit_field.name: UUID_CHECK
bit_field.description: Enforce UUID match during Debug authentication.

bit_field.name: INVERSE_VALUE
bit_field.description: Inverse value of [15:0]

bit_field.name: NIDEN
bit_field.description: Non Secure non-invasive debug Fixed state

bit_field.name: DBGEN
bit_field.description: Non Secure debug Fixed state

bit_field.name: SPNIDEN
bit_field.description: Secure non-invasive debug Fixed state

bit_field.name: SPIDEN
bit_field.description: Secure invasive debug Fixed state

bit_field.name: DSP_DBGEN
bit_field.description: DSP debug Fixed state

bit_field.name: ISP_CMD_EN
bit_field.description: ISP command Fixed state

bit_field.name: FA_CMD_EN
bit_field.description: Set FA mode command Fixed state

bit_field.name: ME_CMD_EN
bit_field.description: Mass erase flash command fixed state

bit_field.name: INVERSE_VALUE
bit_field.description: Inverse value of [15:0]

bit_field.name: VENDOR_USAGE
bit_field.description: Upper 16 bits of vendor usage field defined in DAP. Lower 16-bits come from customer field area.

bit_field.name: ENF_CNSA
bit_field.description: Enforce CNSA suite algorithm.

bit_field_value.name: SECURE_BOOT_CFG_ENF_CNSA_VALUE_1
bit_field_value.description: ECC P-384 keys, SHA384 and AES256

bit_field_value.name: SECURE_BOOT_CFG_ENF_CNSA_VALUE_2
bit_field_value.description: ECC P-384 keys, SHA384 and AES256

bit_field_value.name: SECURE_BOOT_CFG_ENF_CNSA_VALUE_3
bit_field_value.description: ECC P-384 keys, SHA384 and AES256

bit_field.name: DICE_INC_NXP_CFG
bit_field.description: Include NXP area in DICE computation.

bit_field.name: DICE_CUST_CFG
bit_field.description: Include Customer factory area (including keys) in DICE computation.

bit_field.name: SKIP_DICE
bit_field.description: Skip DICE computation.

bit_field.name: ENF_TZM_PRESET
bit_field.description: TrustZone-M mode.

bit_field_value.name: SECURE_BOOT_CFG_ENF_TZM_PRESET_VALUE_1
bit_field_value.description: Enforce preset TZM data in image manifest.

bit_field_value.name: SECURE_BOOT_CFG_ENF_TZM_PRESET_VALUE_2
bit_field_value.description: Enforce preset TZM data in image manifest.

bit_field_value.name: SECURE_BOOT_CFG_ENF_TZM_PRESET_VALUE_3
bit_field_value.description: Enforce preset TZM data in image manifest.

bit_field.name: BLOCK_SET_KEY
bit_field.description: Block PUF key code generation.

bit_field.name: BLOCK_ENROLL
bit_field.description: Block PUF enrollement

bit_field.name: FIPS_SHA_STEN
bit_field.description: Enable self-test for SHA2 block on power-up. Needed for FIPS certification. If this field is non-zero run self-test and log result in BOOT_STATE register.

bit_field_value.name: SECURE_BOOT_CFG_FIPS_SHA_STEN_VALUE_2
bit_field_value.description: On failure enter ISP mode for recovery.

bit_field_value.name: SECURE_BOOT_CFG_FIPS_SHA_STEN_VALUE_3
bit_field_value.description: On failure lock the device to enforce power-cycle.

bit_field.name: FIPS_AES_STEN
bit_field.description: Enable self-test for AES block on power-up. Needed for FIPS certification. If this field is non-zero run self-test and log result in BOOT_STATE register.

bit_field_value.name: SECURE_BOOT_CFG_FIPS_AES_STEN_VALUE_2
bit_field_value.description: On failure enter ISP mode for recovery.

bit_field_value.name: SECURE_BOOT_CFG_FIPS_AES_STEN_VALUE_3
bit_field_value.description: On failure lock the device to enforce power-cycle.

bit_field.name: FIPS_ECDSA_STEN
bit_field.description: Enable self-test for ECDSA block on power-up. Needed for FIPS certification. If this field is non-zero run self-test and log result in BOOT_STATE register.

bit_field_value.name: SECURE_BOOT_CFG_FIPS_ECDSA_STEN_VALUE_2
bit_field_value.description: On failure enter ISP mode for recovery.

bit_field_value.name: SECURE_BOOT_CFG_FIPS_ECDSA_STEN_VALUE_3
bit_field_value.description: On failure lock the device to enforce power-cycle.

bit_field.name: FIPS_DRBG_STEN
bit_field.description: Enable self-test for DRBG block on power-up. Needed for FIPS certification. If this field is non-zero run self-test and log result in BOOT_STATE register.

bit_field_value.name: SECURE_BOOT_CFG_FIPS_DRBG_STEN_VALUE_2
bit_field_value.description: On failure enter ISP mode for recovery.

bit_field_value.name: SECURE_BOOT_CFG_FIPS_DRBG_STEN_VALUE_3
bit_field_value.description: On failure lock the device to enforce power-cycle.

bit_field.name: FIPS_CMAC_STEN
bit_field.description: Enable self-test for CMAC block on power-up. Needed for FIPS certification. If this field is non-zero run self-test and log result in BOOT_STATE register.

bit_field_value.name: SECURE_BOOT_CFG_FIPS_CMAC_STEN_VALUE_2
bit_field_value.description: On failure enter ISP mode for recovery.

bit_field_value.name: SECURE_BOOT_CFG_FIPS_CMAC_STEN_VALUE_3
bit_field_value.description: On failure lock the device to enforce power-cycle.

bit_field.name: FIPS_KDF_STEN
bit_field.description: Enable self-test for KDF block on power-up. Needed for FIPS certification. If this field is non-zero run self-test and log result in BOOT_STATE register.

bit_field_value.name: SECURE_BOOT_CFG_FIPS_KDF_STEN_VALUE_2
bit_field_value.description: On failure enter ISP mode for recovery.

bit_field_value.name: SECURE_BOOT_CFG_FIPS_KDF_STEN_VALUE_3
bit_field_value.description: On failure lock the device to enforce power-cycle.

bit_field.name: SEC_BOOT_EN
bit_field.description: Secure boot enable.

bit_field_value.name: SECURE_BOOT_CFG_FIPS_KDF_STEN_VALUE_0
bit_field_value.description: Plain image (internal flash with or without CRC)

bit_field_value.name: SECURE_BOOT_CFG_FIPS_KDF_STEN_VALUE_2
bit_field_value.description: Do completese ECDSA checking of signed images. (internal flash, ECDSA signed)

bit_field_value.name: SECURE_BOOT_CFG_FIPS_KDF_STEN_VALUE_3
bit_field_value.description: Do completese ECDSA checking of signed images. (internal flash, ECDSA signed)

bit_field.name: LOCK_REG0
bit_field.description: Lock PRINCE region0 settings.

bit_field.name: LOCK_REG1
bit_field.description: Lock PRINCE region1 settings.

bit_field.name: LOCK_REG2
bit_field.description: Lock PRINCE region2 settings.

bit_field.name: REG0_ERASE_CHECK_EN
bit_field.description: For PRINCE region0 enable checking whether all encrypted pages are erased together.

bit_field.name: REG1_ERASE_CHECK_EN
bit_field.description: For PRINCE region1 enable checking whether all encrypted pages are erased together.

bit_field.name: REG2_ERASE_CHECK_EN
bit_field.description: For PRINCE region2 enable checking whether all encrypted pages are erased together.

bit_field.name: TRIM_VALID
bit_field.description: 0 : Capa Bank trimmings not valid. Default trimmings value are used. 1 : Capa Bank trimmings valid.

bit_field.name: XTAL_LOAD_CAP_IEC_PF_X100
bit_field.description: Load capacitance, pF x 100. For example, 6pF becomes 600.

bit_field.name: PCB_XIN_PARA_CAP_PF_X100
bit_field.description: PCB XIN parasitic capacitance, pF x 100. For example, 6pF becomes 600.

bit_field.name: PCB_XOUT_PARA_CAP_PF_X100
bit_field.description: PCB XOUT parasitic capacitance, pF x 100. For example, 6pF becomes 600.

bit_field.name: TRIM_VALID
bit_field.description: 0 : Capa Bank trimmings not valid. Default trimmings value are used. 1 : Capa Bank trimmings valid.

bit_field.name: XTAL_LOAD_CAP_IEC_PF_X100
bit_field.description: Load capacitance, pF x 100. For example, 6pF becomes 600.

bit_field.name: PCB_XIN_PARA_CAP_PF_X100
bit_field.description: PCB XIN parasitic capacitance, pF x 100. For example, 6pF becomes 600.

bit_field.name: PCB_XOUT_PARA_CAP_PF_X100
bit_field.description: PCB XOUT parasitic capacitance, pF x 100. For example, 6pF becomes 600.

register.name: FLASH_REMAP_SIZE
register.description: This 32-bit register contains the size of the image to remap, in bytes. The 12 LSBs are ignored, so the size granularity is 4KB.

bit_field.name: FIELD
bit_field.description: This 32-bit register contains the size of the image to remap, in bytes. The 12 LSBs are ignored, so the size granularity is 4KB.

register.name: FLASH_REMAP_OFFSET
register.description: This 32-bit register contains the offset by which the image is to be remapped. The 12 LSBs are ignored, so the remap granularity is 4KB.

bit_field.name: FIELD
bit_field.description: This 32-bit register contains the offset by which the image is to be remapped. The 12 LSBs are ignored, so the remap granularity is 4KB.

bit_field.name: FLEXSPI_AUTO_PROBE_EN
bit_field.description: Quad/Octal-SPI flash auto probe feature enable

bit_field.name: FLEXSPI_PROBE_TYPE
bit_field.description: Quad/Octal-SPI flash probe type.

bit_field.name: FLEXSPI_FLASH_TYPE
bit_field.description: Define typical Serial NOR Flash types.

bit_field.name: FLEXSPI_DUMMY_CYCLES
bit_field.description: Quad/Octal-SPI dummy cycles for read command.

bit_field.name: FLEXSPI_FREQUENCY
bit_field.description: Q/O-SPI flash interface frequency.

bit_field.name: FLEXSPI_RESET_ENABLE
bit_field.description: Use QSPI_RESET_PIN to reset the flash device.

bit_field_value.name: FLEXSPI_BOOT_CFG_0_FLEXSPI_RESET_ENABLE_VALUE_0
bit_field_value.description: NO_RESET(O/QSPI device reset pin is not connected or available.)

bit_field_value.name: FLEXSPI_BOOT_CFG_0_FLEXSPI_RESET_ENABLE_VALUE_1
bit_field_value.description: EN_RESET(O/QSPI device reset pin is connected to a GPIO (QSPI_RESET_PIN).)

bit_field.name: FLEXSPI_RESET_GPIO_PORT
bit_field.description: GPIO port number to use for O/QSPI reset function.

bit_field.name: FLEXSPI_RESET_GPIO_PIN
bit_field.description: GPIO pin number to use for O/QSPI reset function.

bit_field.name: FLEXSPI_HOLD TIME
bit_field.description: Wait time before access to Serial Flash.

bit_field.name: FLEXSPI_PWR_HOLD_TIME
bit_field.description: Delay after POR before accessing Quad/Octal-SPI flash devices in addition to delay defined by FLEXSPI_HOLD TIME field.

bit_field.name: FLEXSPI_DELAY_CELL_NUM
bit_field.description: Delay cell numbers for Flash read sampling via DQS (either internal loopback or external DQS)

bit_field.name: FLEXSPI_IMAGE_OFFSET
bit_field.description: Any offset in memory mapped Q/Octal-SPI Flash area could be remapped to offset zero to support eXecute In Place (XIP) of image programmed at different offset.

bit_field.name: FLEXSPI_REMAP_IMAGE_SIZE
bit_field.description: Any offset in memory mapped QSPI Flash area could be remapped to offset zero to support eXecute In Place (XIP) of image programmed at different offset.
